title: Ep. 53 - The Penis Skirt
description:
On today’s show, the guys are holding it down in Indy while Pat and Foxy are in Orlando on WWE business. They chat about Nick and Connor’s road trip to Cleveland and Pittsburgh, Gump more than likely being sent back to Canada and not being able to get back in, whether or not Netflix should get rid of the “are you still watching?” button, people dying taking selfies, Lev Bell taking everyone on a wild ride yesterday, the pothole situation in Indianapolis reaching a boiling point, Aunt Becky from Full House being indicted in a major college scandal, Digs pitches an invention for massage parlors across the world, and Todd recaps his night at the Metallica concert. It's a fun one. Come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, @baileymccomas, and @GumpSox10, and closes with a timeless classic from the legend, Bob Seger.
dc:creator: The Pod
